post.author: Admin
post.title: Munching For Music Monday Fiesta!
post.description: Dear Band Families, Our next Munching for Music event will allow you to celebrate Siete de Mayo! Thi
post.content:
Dear Band Families,

Our next Munching for Music event will allow you to celebrate Siete de Mayo! This is not to be confused with the more well-know Cinco de Mayo. What sets our special day apart is the fact that when you celebrate by eating at Chipotle, you help raise money for the band! ¡Que oportunidad tan fantástica!

Chipotle
Monday, May 7, 2018
4-8pm
4416 E Royalton Rd, Brecksville, OH 44141

Please take a flyer, show it on your phone, or simply tell them you’re supporting the band to have your purchase count. Online orders do not count, only in-store purchases.

So, if you’ve ever needed an excuse for celebrating twice within three days, this is definitely it! ¡Vamos de fiesta!

We appreciate you supporting our band!
¡Muchas gracias!
